title: Leiah hian vakvaite
lyrics:
Leiah hian vakvaite
Leh mikhual kan ni;
Khawvel nuam hle mahse,
Sualna a hnai thin.

Ram nuam zawk chu kan nei,
Sual awm lohna chu;
Lungngaih, mangannate,
Luhna ngai loh chu.

Isuan min chhandam ta,
Thu awih min zirtir;
Thlarau, min hruai zel la,
Kan van kawng panin.

Leiah hian vakvaite
Leh mikhual kan ni;
Mahse, vana kan in,
A lo hnai fo thin.
